life.quote: There’s a crack (or cracks) in everyone…that’s how the light of God gets in.
life.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

love.quote: To resist the frigidity of old age, one must combine the body, the mind, and the heart. And to keep these in parallel vigor one must exercise, study, and love.
love.author: Alan Bleasdale

management.quote: An executive is a person who always decides; sometimes he decides correctly, but he always decides.
management.author: John H. Patterson

art.quote: Everything that is beautiful and noble is the product of reason and calculation.
art.author: Charles Baudelaire

inspiring.quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her: but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.
inspiring.author: Voltaire

sports.quote: Hockey is the original extreme sport.
sports.author: Tom Ward

funny.quote: Once somebody stole our car. I asked my wife if she saw who it was. she said No, but I did get the license number.
funny.author: Rodney Dangerfield
